com.pump.animation

Class CachedAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.animation.AbstractAnimation
      • com.pump.animation.CachedAnimation

  • public class CachedAnimation
extends AbstractAnimation
    This stores an animation in memory as a series of cached BMP images.

    Saving these images to the disk may be slightly expensive, but this model lets you store animations that are arbitrarily large. (That is: they are limited by your hard disk space and not your RAM.)

    See Also:
    BufferedAnimation
